name: MenuCheckboxItem
description: Displays a menu item with checkbox functionality for toggling selection state. Renders a <div> element.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: defaultChecked
props.description:
Whether the checkbox item is initially ticked.

To render a controlled checkbox item, use the `checked` prop instead.

props.name: label
props.description: Overrides the text label to use when the item is matched during keyboard text navigation.

props.name: onClick
props.description: The click handler for the menu item.

props.name: nativeButton
props.description:
Whether the component renders a native `<button>` element when replacing it
via the `render` prop.
Set to `true` if the rendered element is a native button.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: closeOnClick
props.description: Whether to close the menu when the item is clicked.

props.name: checked
props.description:
Whether the checkbox item is currently ticked.

To render an uncontrolled checkbox item, use the `defaultChecked` prop instead.

props.name: onCheckedChange
props.description: Event handler called when the checkbox item is ticked or unticked.
